doc.field: American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA), New York Local Office Records
American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA), New York Local Office Records

This series is comprised of the minutes of the board of the New York Local, and the transcibed membership meeting minutes of AFRA, AFTRA, and the Television Authority (TVA), which include appeals by members during the blacklist era. The series includes both minutes and full transcriptions of select meetings.
American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (AFTRA), New York Local Office Records
